result.reason: The 'Bold Active Connections' feature is partially implemented (settings exist in OptionsAppearancePage) but the rendering logic is missing in ConnectionTree.cs. The 'Replace Icon' feature appears to be implemented in StatusImageList.cs but needs verification.
result.approach: Update ConnectionTree.FormatCell to apply bold font to active connections if the 'BoldActiveConnections' setting is enabled. Ensure that toggling this setting in AppearancePage triggers a refresh of the ConnectionTree to apply the changes immediately.
